contents.title: From Tony Rontino's
contents.text: LIVE ALBUM RECORDED FROM TONY RONTINO'S ITALIAN RESTAURANT IN WEST CHESTER

contents.title: Lemonade Performance
contents.text: Mister Shane is selling the performance of the sale of a glass of lemonade for $1,000.

contents.title: SWEET NOTHINGS â€” BDSMR (Visual)
contents.text: BDSMR is a really good minimal electronic album by SWEET NOTHINGS. I did not make the music, but I made the website, some photos, two videos (ETERNITY and ZODIAC) and the album art (with help!). Click it!!

contents.title: THE WATCHER
contents.text: THE WATCHER is a film about watching. It is a concatenation of a lot of footage of watching. Watch THE WATCHER.

contents.title: I Say Nothing
contents.text: Video. Power of Refusal. Apprenticeship.

contents.title: CLAP
contents.text: Music tracks made from clap sounds. Mainly the 808 clap sound, the cheap toy one not the real one. I learned that when it was too late. Every sound is a clap. Please clap.

contents.title: Luddy
contents.text: Luddy put me on his list. A compilation of financial tech recruiting email correspondence that took place over the course of 20 months followed by a devolving sequence of collage-accompanied reflections. I have a small run of printed copies available, please contact me to obtain one :).

contents.title: There It Is
contents.text: A 32 epsiode cooking and lifestyle series performed by "Kev." "What's new with you?" "I've been cooking a lot recently." "Oh."

contents.title: Here I Am
contents.text: A 28 epsiode series of instructional yoga videos performed by "Kev." I did the same thing every day but I did not improve.

contents.title: These Are The 50 Facts You Didn't Know About Stranger Things
contents.text: Mister Shane researched 50 amazing facts about the hit TV series Stranger Things.

contents.title: Woody
contents.text: Mister Shane made a Woody mask.

contents.title: Daddy's Essays Complete Edition
contents.text: I put all of the essays about past that I wrote in the Spring in a book, with some photos taken by my mom and myself. Digital copy avaialble at link, if you want a printed copy please contact me :). Love ya!

contents.title: Manikin
contents.text: Text and Image collection made through a window

contents.title: The Rock and The Rock
contents.text: A small baby game / film about the inevitable and natural attraction of two rocks to one another. It is set in the desert. Rock on.

contents.title: MAX AND ROLL
contents.text: Carmichael's first album. Not just an album, a Visual Software Classic Rock MIDI Album incorporating videos of friend Max playing the piano. In 3D and 2D!!! All D.

contents.title: Daddy's Essays #2
contents.text: An extension of the series of essays that began with "Daddy's Essays #1."

contents.title: Johnny Football
contents.text: I hope Johnny goes to jail music. I hope my son goes to jail music. I hope my dad goes to jail music.

contents.title: Daddy's Essays #1
contents.text: A couple of essays about my childhood and my dad. All love for him now :)

contents.title: My Bad Video
contents.text: Video for the Dog Shadow track. I took off my shirt again.

contents.title: FACE TIME
contents.text: Facial Aspect Character Emulator with Timed Intuitive Muscular Expression. A realtime facial distortion suite. Make a better face and print it out and paste it on your skin.

contents.title: Wasted Years Video
contents.text: Video for the Dog Shadow track. Footage from an urban domestic dog park in downtown New York City.

contents.title: Dog Years
contents.text: An album of Hard Emotional Tracks divided into three thematic acts: you can hear the pride!! Swelling! Big bunch of ideas in this one. Listen to "Inside Man" and "Cut It Off."

contents.title: HDS VOL. 1
contents.text: A data-object media compilation on which a lot of my and friends' recent projects/work/data was released! You can purchase HDS Vol. 1 at www.hdsllc.website. Please do it and support friends and lovers everywhere!!

contents.title: At Sea
contents.text: Mister Shane went on a Carnival cruise from New Orleans to Mexico. This is a multimedia collection made of music and photos from that journey. A journey at sea. Every sound is either a field recording from the ship or Shane's voice. He went on vacation. He got what he wanted. He found it.

contents.title: Love Songs
contents.text: A set of 32 of the Greatest Pop Love Songs Of All Time that I compiled and recorded renditions of with the aid of YouTube lyrics videos. An icy-hot profession of love and pain.

contents.title: Second Round Square Solo
contents.text: A video permutation series where 13 poems, ascending from in length from three to fifteen lines, are mechanically read in every possible permutated line-order. It's Very Cool™.

contents.title: Birdhouse Formal Wall Projection
contents.text: NYC Fraternity big birdhouse themed party commissioned request for video project with no reference to birds so I referenced construction because it is through architecture through which we humans fly (CHROME ONLY).

contents.title: Chromatic Deduction
contents.text: A series of films that were broken down into frames and rearranged temporally with various color-sorting techniques into ColorTime.

contents.title: Multiplex Cinema
contents.text: Task-oriented parallel films rearranged from A1A2A3B1B2B3C1C2C3 to A1B1C1A2B2C2A3B3C3 for achievement pleasure.

contents.title: Chromatic Reduction
contents.text: A rainbow spectrum of films where each frame is reduced to its most relevant color and rendered into an ABSTRACT COLORSTREAM. Recommended: Minions.

contents.title: fffight.site
contents.text: Grotesque live-composed permutations of all possibilities hinted at by Bourne rebourne. The ultimate action movie site.

contents.title: Bourne rebourne
contents.text: Frankensteinien reconstruction of shots from the Bourne series that amplify what we wanted.

contents.title: Life in Review
contents.text: A stream of Facebook's emotive digital memories flashes before your physical eyes.

contents.title: feud.online
contents.text: A series of endless films about family and spectacle featuring delicate clips from TV's Family Feud.

contents.title: Faithful Companion
contents.text: The first music release from Dog Shadow, featuring blasted electronic emotional dog sounds.

contents.title: Second Shane
contents.text: A complex and growing interactive world unified by consistent themes both contemporary + eternal. Please explore and see what you can find...

contents.title: God's Website
contents.text: Helps us track what we say about God, right now. Good or bad? Is it two-way?

contents.title: 30 Pushups By Myself
contents.text: 9 hours of accumulated clerical mistakes. Work and Work and Work and this is what I get. 11 minute video.

contents.title: Rain in a Room
contents.text: Let the Wet wash over You. Water falls all around you yet you never wet yourself, then witness a flood of others experiencing the Rain Room artwork. 20 minutes recommended.

contents.title: David Zwirnher Online
contents.text: Fall through the Hole. Easy and Quick and at Home. Rapid View all the Art ever exhibited at the David Zwirnher New York City Art Gallery. 15 minutes recommended.

contents.title: And Rakes To Spread The Haul
contents.text: A collection of poems hailing the One Man One Tool One Purpose ideology. Please contact me to obtain a physical book.

contents.title: [Love Poem]
contents.text: I made gold from a Richard Brautigan poem

contents.title: New Snock Planet
contents.text: A persistent new world, boiling the essence, becoming. Chat and interact with others and me.

contents.title: Luminal.space
contents.text: An installation on Columbia's Low Steps; long-term project made with many people more talented than me. Click for info.

contents.title: Job Fair
contents.text: Simulation of a startup job fair / earn and prove your worth

contents.text: Explore your twitter self with a museum made just for u

contents.title: Ronald
contents.text: He just can't seem to get outside of that computer trash can. Help him.
Translation of phone words to phone sounds using DTMF tones

contents.text: Tech Masculinity / Wrestling Dylan with Kinect puppets

contents.title: Corpse
contents.text: Computer corpse for Postcrypt's Exquisite Corpse show. Made w/ Ben, Dylan, Henry. I did the foot.

contents.text: I've worked a lot on the VSCO iOS app. It is fun and good for enjoying some photos On The Go (:.

contents.title: Sheen
contents.text: A small extension of THREE.js with helpful starter pack for my own projects. You are welcome to use it. You also don't have to.

contents.title: dummy-meat-timer
contents.text: A simple HTML tool for timing a sequence of events. I used it to record ticks of when each word in the song "With Arms Wide Open" occurs :).

contents.text: a programming language made for manipulating and combining various media styles. made it for a class with melody sahil henry dylan. check the examples.

I want more links. Would you like to submit a link? Got a site? Please email me: kevin.e.roark@gmail.com. I don't wish to exclude *anyone* from this link section, I might just not know your site got it??
